comment_0: He's describing the different types of men, but saying that none of them can ever provide the same love Sam did, or wants to, for this person.
comment_1: This song is perfect (like the rest in this album). The lyrics are very clear; he says to the other person that no matter what others may offer, they'll never be good enough to him, they'll never love him like he does, nobody can. I simple and deep at the same time. love it.
comment_2: How do you find swagger in a heartbreak? See above. Nice, Sam, very nice.
